summary: Refusing to face his adulthood, a Casanova must deal with the fact that he has a young pregnant daughter from an earlier relationship.
cast: Adrián Suar|Florencia Bertotti|Claudia Fontán|Gabriel Chame|Ana María Castel|Juan Carlos Galván|Andrés Ciavaglia|Andrea Goldberg|José Mehrez|Mela Green|Florencia Miller|Luly Drozdek|Gabriela Canaves|Maria Belen Vigliero|Lorenzo Meneghelli|Josefina Cuneo|Ema Rivera|Quela Fernandez|Gabriela Acosta|Laurita Fernández|Marco Gianoli|Alejandro Ojeda|Corina Romero
title: Igualita a mi
